original: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la shes pa po'am mthong ba po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin
analyzed: gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa la shes pa po'am mthong ba po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin
translated: The statement “The one who knows or sees form, feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness does not exist” is the perfection of wisdom.

original: no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: de ltar yid ches pa'i lung de dag grub pa ni nye bar len pa po ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i yon tan yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yid ches pa'i lung de dag grub pa ni nye bar len pa po ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i yon tan yin te /
translated: The establishment of these scriptures that inspire confidence is the quality of the teaching of the essencelessness of the appropriator.

original: de'i phyir kho bos rang gi bsam pas rtog ge skam po tsam gyis nye bar len pa po ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir kho bos rang gi bsam pas rtog ge skam po tsam gyis nye bar len pa po ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, I have not taught the essencelessness of the appropriator through mere dry logic of my own invention.

original: 'di ltar lung de dag kyang yod do //
analyzed: 'di ltar lung de dag kyang yod do //
translated: For, these scriptures exist.

original: gang gi phyir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde mtha' yas pa dag las nye bar len pa po ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa de dag 'dir bstan bcos 'dis rnam par bshad par bya ba'i yul nyid du bstan pa ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga🔽nas kyis mkhyen rlabs yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde mtha' yas pa dag las nye bar len pa po ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa de dag 'dir bstan bcos 'dis rnam par bshad par bya ba'i yul nyid du bstan pa ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyis mkhyen rlabs yin no //
translated: indicate that the master Nāgārjuna himself knew that the treatises he composed were commentaries on the limitless Mahāyāna sūtras that teach that the appropriator is essenceless.

original: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
analyzed: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma las /
translated: The master Bhāviveka’s Lamp of Wisdom, a commentary on Root Verses on the Middle Way, says:

original: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the analysis called “The Examination of the Appar ently Valid and the Ultimate.”

original: rab tu byed pa dgu pa rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyis nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs so /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa dgu pa rgya cher 'grel pa slob dpon spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs kyis nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the commentary on the ninth chapter of Root Verses on the Middle Way, composed by the master Avalokitavrata.

original: // / de ni nye bar len pa po dang nye bar @208b blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa bcu pa brtsam mo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: // / de ni nye bar len pa po dang nye bar @208b blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa bcu pa brtsam mo zhes bya ba la /
translated: 1. Now, in order to demonstrate the meaning of the statement that dependent origination is neither one nor many, by refuting the special counter positions that the appropriator and the appropriated are essenceless, the tenth chapter is begun.

original: dbang gis zhes bya ba'i sgra skabs 'dir yang dam bcas pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i don dang / gzhung 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ba'i don du blta ste /
analyzed: dbang gis zhes bya ba'i sgra skabs 'dir yang dam bcas pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i don dang / gzhung 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ba'i don du blta ste /
translated: The word “meaning” in “the meaning of the statement” should be understood in this context to have the sense of the reason for the assertion and the sense of the reason for the text that follows.

original: tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: tshig gi don ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The meaning of the words is as before.

original: de la dam bcas pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i don gyi dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: de la dam bcas pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i don gyi dbang du byas nas /
translated: In this regard, in terms of the reason for the assertion,

original: de ni nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de ni nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: it is said, “by refuting the special counter positions that the appropriator and the appropriated are essenceless.”

original: bstan bcos mdzad pas rkyen brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po brtsam pa'i skabs su dngos po thams cad skye ba med pas dam bca' ba mdzad pas 'dir yang sngar bstan bcos mdzad pas ci ltar dam bcas pa de la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i don gyi dbang du🔽byas nas de skad smras te /
analyzed: bstan bcos mdzad pas rkyen brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa dang po brtsam pa'i skabs su dngos po thams cad skye ba med pas dam bca' ba mdzad pas 'dir yang sngar bstan bcos mdzad pas ci ltar dam bcas pa de la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i don gyi dbang du byas nas de skad smras te /
translated: Since the treatise author, in the first chapter of the examination of conditions, made the thesis that all things are unarisen, here too he speaks in terms of the purpose of engaging in that thesis as it was made by the treatise author.

original: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa ni rang gi phyogs yin no //
analyzed: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa ni rang gi phyogs yin no //
translated: The appropriator and that appropriated are essenceless is our own position.

original: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni phyir rgol bar byed pa'i phyogs yin te /
analyzed: de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni phyir rgol bar byed pa'i phyogs yin te /
translated: The position that is contrary to that is the opponent’s position.

original: 'di lta ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid du smra ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di lta ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag ngo bo nyid yod pa nyid du smra ba yin no //
translated: That is to say, it is the position that the aggregates, elements, and faculties exist essentially.

original: de'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni pha rol pos phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag yod pa nyid du ston pa'i phyogs snga ma nye bar gzhag pa 'og nas don dam par nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag yod pa kho na
analyzed: de'i khyad par zhes bya ba ni pha rol pos phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag yod pa nyid du ston pa'i phyogs snga ma nye bar gzhag pa 'og nas don dam par nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag yod pa kho na
translated: The opponent’s position is that the appropriator and that appropriated exist ultimately,

original: yin te / phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir dper na me dang bud shing bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dag yin no //
analyzed: yin te / phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir dper na me dang bud shing bzhin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba dag yin no //
translated: because they are mutually dependent, like fire and fuel.

original: de dgag pas zhes bya ba ni de dgag pa'i dbang du byas nas rab tu byed pa bcu pa brtsam mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dgag pas zhes bya ba ni de dgag pa'i dbang du byas nas rab tu byed pa bcu pa brtsam mo zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Refuting that” means that chapter ten is composed in order to refute that.

original: gzhung 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ba'i don gyi dbang du byas nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa bcu pa brtsam mo zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gzhung 'og nas 'byung ba dang sbyar ba'i don gyi dbang du byas nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa bcu pa brtsam mo zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The meaning of the treatise that will be explained below is that dependent origination is neither the same nor different.🔽The tenth chapter is composed in order to demonstrate the meaning of that.🔽The meaning of the treatise that will be explained below is that dependent origination is neither the same nor different.

original: me dang bud shing brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa bcu pa'i gzhung 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'i don ni rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa yin pas de'i dbang du byas nas de skad smras so //🔽rab tu byed pa 'di'i 'bras bu ni gang yin rnam pa @209a * //
analyzed: me dang bud shing brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa bcu pa'i gzhung 'og nas 'byung ba 'di'i don ni rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa yin pas de'i dbang du byas nas de skad smras so // rab tu byed pa 'di'i 'bras bu ni gang yin rnam pa @209a * //
translated: The meaning of the treatise that will be explained below is that dependent origination is neither the same nor different.🔽What is the result of this chapter?

original: gang gis ni 'bras bu de 'thob ce na /
analyzed: gang gis ni 'bras bu de 'thob ce na /
translated: By what means is that result obtained?

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin la /🔽nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pa'i rnam pas /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa ni 'di'i 'bras bu yin la / nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pa'i rnam pas /
translated: The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.

original: ni 'bras bu de 'thob pas de'i phyir 'grel pa byed pas rab tu byed pa'i mtshams sbyar ba'i skabs 'dir thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu dang po kho nar bstan to //
analyzed: ni 'bras bu de 'thob pas de'i phyir 'grel pa byed pas rab tu byed pa'i mtshams sbyar ba'i skabs 'dir thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu dang po kho nar bstan to //
translated: The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.

original: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par zhes smos pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'dir smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag ngo bo nyid med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par zhes smos pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir 'dir smras pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: The result of this is the teaching of the distinction of dependent origination as neither the same nor different.🔽The result of this is the

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag de ltar bkag tu zin kyang de dag la mngon par zhen pa rang gi sde pa dag gis de mi bzod pas yang de dag 'di skad ces zer ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag de ltar bkag tu zin kyang de dag la mngon par zhen pa rang gi sde pa dag gis de mi bzod pas yang de dag 'di skad ces zer ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Although the aggregates, elements, and sense bases have been refuted in this way, those of our own faction who are attached to them will not tolerate that.

original: de'i phyir / 'di la khyed kyis nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag phan tshun ltos nas rab tu 'grub par smras pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir / 'di la khyed kyis nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag phan tshun ltos nas rab tu 'grub par smras pas /
translated: Therefore, you have said that the appropriator and the appropriated are established in mutual dependence.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs rab tu grub pa'i dbang gis nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba nyid dag bsgrub pa'i phyir sgrub pa smra bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs rab tu grub pa'i dbang gis nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba nyid dag bsgrub pa'i phyir sgrub pa smra bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
translated: Therefore, in order to establish the appropriator and the appropriated by the power of establishing the reason, you must state a proof.

original: don dam par nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: don dam par nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: The appropriator and the appropriated exist ultimately.

original: phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir dper na me dang bud shing bzhin no zhes bya ba dag ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir dper na me dang bud shing bzhin no zhes bya ba dag ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The subject, the predicate of the probandum, the property of the probandum, and the example are to be applied in order.

original: dper na me dang bud shing dag ni phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir yod pa kho na yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: dper na me dang bud shing dag ni phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir yod pa kho na yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: For example, fire and fuel exist because they are mutually dependent.

original: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag kyang phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir yod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag kyang phan tshun ltos pa'i phyir yod pa kho na yin no //
translated: In the same way, the appropriator and that appropriated exist because they are mutually dependent.

original: de'i phyir de grub pas don dam par phung po la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la brten nas nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang bdag bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nye bar sbyar ba'i
analyzed: de'i phyir de grub pas don dam par phung po la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la brten nas nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang bdag bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nye bar sbyar ba'i
translated: Therefore, because that is established, the aggregates and so on exist ultimately because the Bhagavān taught the appropriator and that appropriated in dependence on them.

original: sbyor ba yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba yin te /
translated: This is the application of the syllogism.

original: de'i phyir nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba de grub pas don dam par phung po la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba de grub pas don dam par phung po la sogs pa dag yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Therefore, since the appropriator and that appropriated exist, the aggregates and so on exist ultimately.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa de dag la brten nas nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang bdag bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po la sogs pa de dag la brten nas nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang bdag bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the Bhagavān taught the appropriator and that appropriated in dependence on the aggregates and so on.

original: de ltar gtan tshigs grub pas 'dod pa grub po zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu @209b ba dang tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gtan tshigs grub pas 'dod pa grub po zhes bya ba ni mjug bsdu @209b ba dang tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin te /
translated: Thus, since the reason is established, the thesis is established. This is the conclusion and the result of the valid knowledge.

original: de ltar nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag yod par grub pas phung po la sogs pa dag don dam par yod par 'dod pa 'grub po zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de ltar nye bar len pa po dang nye bar blang ba dag yod par grub pas phung po la sogs pa dag don dam par yod par 'dod pa 'grub po zhes zer ro //
translated: Thus, since the existence of the appropriator and that appropriated is established, the existence of the aggregates and so on ultimately is established.

original: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis 'dir bshad pa /🔽skye ba spyir bkag pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis 'dir bshad pa / skye ba spyir bkag pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
translated: In response to that statement, the author of the commentary explains here:🔽Since arising in general is refuted,

original: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: form is not observed apart from the cause of form.

original: zhes bya ba der rdzas su yod pa nyid bkag pas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba der rdzas su yod pa nyid bkag pas /
translated: Thus, since the substantial existence of fire and fuel is refuted,

original: me dang bud shing dag gi yod pa nyid dgag pa yang 'grub mod kyi /
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag gi yod pa nyid dgag pa yang 'grub mod kyi /
translated: the existence of fire and fuel is also established as refuted.

original: yang de med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir sgrub pa gzhan sems gtod la nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
analyzed: yang de med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir sgrub pa gzhan sems gtod la nyon cig ces bya ba la sogs pa smras te /
translated: However, in order to demonstrate that they are nonexistent, Nāgārjuna states, “Listen properly to the refutation,” and so on.🔽In the chapter on conditions and so on, arising in general is refuted.

original: sngar rkyen brtag pa'i skabs la sogs pa'i gnas skabs thams cad du skye ba spyir bkag pa nyid dang / phung po brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa'i skabs su /
analyzed: sngar rkyen brtag pa'i skabs la sogs pa'i gnas skabs thams cad du skye ba spyir bkag pa nyid dang / phung po brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa'i skabs su /
translated: In the chapter on the aggregates, it is said:

original: gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu ni ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from the cause of form,

original: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni dmigs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: form is not observed.

original: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
analyzed: gzugs zhes bya ba ma gtogs par //
translated: Apart from what is called form,

original: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rgyu yang mi snang ngo //
translated: the cause of form is not seen.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa der gzugs rdzas su yod pa de nyid bkag pas me dang bud shing dag gi yod pa nyid dgag pa yang grub mod kyi yang me dang bud shing de med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir sgrub pa gzhan sems gtod🔽la nyon cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa der gzugs rdzas su yod pa de nyid bkag pas me dang bud shing dag gi yod pa nyid dgag pa yang grub mod kyi yang me dang bud shing de med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir sgrub pa gzhan sems gtod la nyon cig ces bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: But in order to demonstrate that fire and fuel do not exist, the author of the commentary says, “Listen, you who are intent on establishing the existence of fire and fuel.”🔽Here, if you maintain that fire and fuel exist, you must accept that they are either identical or different.

original: 'di la me dang bud shing dag yod pa nyid du 'dod na gcig pa nyid dam gzhan nyid du khas blang bar bya grang na zhes bya bas ni brtags pa'i gal te de gnyis gnyi gar yang mi 'thad pas pha rol po dag dpe med pas sgrub pa
analyzed: 'di la me dang bud shing dag yod pa nyid du 'dod na gcig pa nyid dam gzhan nyid du khas blang bar bya grang na zhes bya bas ni brtags pa'i gal te de gnyis gnyi gar yang mi 'thad pas pha rol po dag dpe med pas sgrub pa
translated: The phrase “if you maintain that they exist” shows that since neither is tenable, the opponent’s example is not established.

original: yang mi 'grub par ston to //
analyzed: yang mi 'grub par ston to //
translated: The opponent’s proof is not established.

original: des cir 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase “what is the problem with that?”

original: pha rol po dag 'dri ba'i tshig yin no //
analyzed: pha rol po dag 'dri ba'i tshig yin no //
translated: is a question from the opponent.

original: de la re zhig brtag pa dang po mi 'thad par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
analyzed: de la re zhig brtag pa dang po mi 'thad par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras so //
translated: In response to that, the first hypothesis is untenable.

original: de la re zhig bud shing dang me'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir de la bud shing ni sa la sogs pa 'byung ba gsum po dag yin la /
analyzed: de la re zhig bud shing dang me'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir de la bud shing ni sa la sogs pa 'byung ba gsum po dag yin la /
translated: First, in order to teach the characteristics of fuel and fire, he says, Fuel is the three great elements, earth and so on.

original: me ni me'i khams so //
analyzed: me ni me'i khams so //
translated: Fire is the fire element.

original: kha cig na re me ni 'byung ba bzhi po dag las me shas tshor bar gyur pa'o zhe'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: kha cig na re me ni 'byung ba bzhi po dag las me shas tshor bar gyur pa'o zhe'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Some say that fire is the predominance of the fire element among the four great elements.

original: bud shing gi mtshan nyid ni 'byung ba chen po gsum 'dus pa dag yin la /
analyzed: bud shing gi mtshan nyid ni 'byung ba chen po gsum 'dus pa dag yin la /
translated: The characteristic of fuel is the combination of the three great elements.

original: me'i mtshan nyid ni me'i khams 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: me'i mtshan nyid ni me'i khams 'ba' zhig go //
translated: The characteristic of fire is the fire element alone.

original: kha cig na re bud shing gi mtshan nyid ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'dus pa cha mnyam pa dag yin la /
analyzed: kha cig na re bud shing gi mtshan nyid ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'dus pa cha mnyam pa dag yin la /
translated: Some say that the characteristic of fuel is the combination of the four great elements in equal measure.

original: me'i mtshan nyid ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag las me shas che bar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: me'i mtshan nyid ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag las me shas che bar gyur pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of fire is the predominance of the fire element among the four great elements.

original: 'di skad du gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: 'di skad du gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ste /
translated: This is what they say: Whatever form there is,
is composed of the four great elements.

original: thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi dag rgyur byas pa'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Because it is said, “All of this is the four great elements and the four great elements are the cause of the derivative form.”

original: de la 'dir glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos smras pa'i bsgrub pa las bzlog pa rjes su dpag pa mngon te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la 'dir glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos smras pa'i bsgrub pa las bzlog pa rjes su dpag pa mngon te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, because it is a statement that provides an opportunity, the opponent’s proof is reversed and an inference is stated.

original: gal te shing de me yin na /
analyzed: gal te shing de me yin na /
translated: If that tree were fire,

original: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
translated: agent and object would be the same.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed gong ma de la 'dir byed pa po dang las gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i skyon gyi glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du smras pa'i bsgrub pa las bzlog
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed gong ma de la 'dir byed pa po dang las gcig pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i skyon gyi glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du smras pa'i bsgrub pa las bzlog
translated: Because the first half of this verse is a statement that provides an opportunity for the fault that agent and object would be the same, the opponent’s proof that fire and fuel are the same is reversed.

original: pas me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag pa mngon no //
analyzed: pas me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag pa mngon no //
translated: Therefore it is clear that fire and fuel are not the same.

original: de nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshul bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: To demonstrate that very point, the text says:

original: dper na gal te sgra rtag na bum pa yang rtag par thal bar 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod de byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba yin pas de la yang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dper na gal te sgra rtag na bum pa yang rtag par thal bar 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod de byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba yin pas de la yang yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: For example, if sound were permanent, it would follow that a pot would also be permanent, but that is unacceptable because impermanence does not occur without being produced.

original: dper na la la zhig gis sgra rtag go zhes smras pa na 'ga' zhig na re gal te sgra rtag na bum pa yang rtag par thal bar 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: dper na la la zhig gis sgra rtag go zhes smras pa na 'ga' zhig na re gal te sgra rtag na bum pa yang rtag par thal bar 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: For example, if someone says, Sound is permanent, someone else might say, If sound were permanent, it would follow that a pot would also be permanent, but that is unacceptable. Why?🔽Because impermanence does not occur without being produced, and a pot also has impermanence.

original: byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba yin pas bum pa de la yang mi rtag pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba des sgra rtag go zhes bya ba'i tshig de la sgra rtag na bum pa yang rtag par thal bar 'gyur
analyzed: byas pa nyid la mi rtag pa nyid med na mi 'byung ba yin pas bum pa de la yang mi rtag pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba des sgra rtag go zhes bya ba'i tshig de la sgra rtag na bum pa yang rtag par thal bar 'gyur
translated: That statement, Sound is permanent, is a reason that is contradictory to the proposition because it proves that sound is impermanent.

original: ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir sgra rtag pa'i smra bas smra ba'i bsgrub pa las bzlog pas sgra mi rtag par rjes su dpag pa mngon pa de bzhin du 'dir yang me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba de'i byed pa
analyzed: ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir sgra rtag pa'i smra bas smra ba'i bsgrub pa las bzlog pas sgra mi rtag par rjes su dpag pa mngon pa de bzhin du 'dir yang me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba de'i byed pa
translated: Because the words of the opponent are a basis for refutation, the statement “Sound is impermanent because it is produced” is a correct proof.🔽The opponent’s statement “Sound is permanent because it is audible” is a correct refutation of the proof that sound is impermanent.🔽

original: po dang las gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du smras pa'i bsgrub pa las bzlog pas me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag
analyzed: po dang las gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du smras pa'i bsgrub pa las bzlog pas me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag
translated: Because the statement “fire and fuel are the same” is a statement that provides an opportunity for refutation, the explicit inference that “fire and fuel are not the same” is made by reversing the probandum of the opponent’s statement that “fire and fuel are the same.”

original: pa mngon no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: pa mngon no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is what it means.

original: dpe'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir sgra de yang byas pa yin pas de'i phyir sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: dpe'i mjug bsdu ba'i phyir sgra de yang byas pa yin pas de'i phyir sgra ni mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: In order to conclude the example, he says, “Sound is impermanent because it is produced, like a pot.”

original: ci ltar sgra rtag par smra ba de bum pa yang rtag par thal bar gyur pa'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir de las bzlog pas sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya bar rjes su dpag pa mngon pa de🔽bzhin du me dang bud shing @210b dag gcig pa nyid du smra ba yang byed pa po dang las gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir de las bzlog pas che dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ltar sgra rtag par smra ba de bum pa yang rtag par thal bar gyur pa'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir de las bzlog pas sgra mi rtag ste byas pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya bar rjes su dpag pa mngon pa de bzhin du me dang bud shing @210b dag gcig pa nyid du smra ba yang byed pa po dang las gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir de las bzlog pas che dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Just as the statement “Sound is permanent” is a statement that provides an opportunity for the consequence that “A pot is also permanent,” the opposite of that is the inference that is stated: “Sound is impermanent because it is produced, like a pot.”🔽Similarly, the statement “Fire and fuel are the same” is a statement that provides an opportunity for the consequence that “The agent and object are the same,” the opposite of that is the inference that is stated: “Fire and fuel are not the same

original: byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir dper na gcod pa po dang gcad pa dag bzhin no zhes bya bar rjes su dpag pa mngon no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir dper na gcod pa po dang gcad pa dag bzhin no zhes bya bar rjes su dpag pa mngon no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: because they are agent and object, like the one who cuts and that which is cut.”

original: de nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: In order to demonstrate that very inference, here the syllogism is stated: Ultimately fire and fuel are not the same,

original: byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir dper na gcod pa po dang gcad pa dag bzhin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir dper na gcod pa po dang gcad pa dag bzhin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: because they are the agent and object, just like the one who cuts and the one who is cut.

original: dper na gcod pa po dang gcad pa dag ni byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du me dang bud shing dag kyang byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na gcod pa po dang gcad pa dag ni byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du me dang bud shing dag kyang byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: For example, the one who cuts and the one who is cut are not the same because they are the agent and object. In the same way, fire and fuel are not the same because they are the agent and object.

original: me dang bud shing dag byed pa po dang las kyi ngo bo nyid yin par sgrub pa dang de dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par sgrub pa'i mjug bsdu ba dang tshad ma'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir me yang bud shing sreg pa na sreg pa'i byed pa🔽po yin la /
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag byed pa po dang las kyi ngo bo nyid yin par sgrub pa dang de dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par sgrub pa'i mjug bsdu ba dang tshad ma'i 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir me yang bud shing sreg pa na sreg pa'i byed pa🔽po yin la /
translated: In order to establish that fire and fuel are the entity of the agent and object, in order to conclude that they are not the same, and in order to demonstrate the result of valid knowledge, it is said, “Fire is the agent of burning when it burns fuel.”

original: bud shing yang sreg pa na las yin pas me dang bud shing dag la yang byed pa po dang las nyid yod pas de'i phyir de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba smras so //
analyzed: bud shing yang sreg pa na las yin pas me dang bud shing dag la yang byed pa po dang las nyid yod pas de'i phyir de gnyis gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba smras so //
translated: Also, since fuel is the object of the action of burning, both fire and fuel exist as the agent and object of the action of burning. Therefore they are not the same.

original: yang na / gal te shing de me yin na //
analyzed: yang na / gal te shing de me yin na //
translated: Moreover, if that fuel were fire,

original: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las gcig 'gyur //
translated: the agent and object would be the same.

original: de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan ma yin par dam bca' ba'i dam bcas pa la gcig pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas mi tsha ba dang mi sreg pa nyid kyis me'i de dag bsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do zhes
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing las me gzhan ma yin par dam bca' ba'i dam bcas pa la gcig pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas mi tsha ba dang mi sreg pa nyid kyis me'i de dag bsal ba'i phyir chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod do zhes
translated: Therefore, since the thesis that fire is not different from fuel is inferred to be the same, the thesis is undermined by the reason that fire is hot and burning. Thus the error of undermining the specific property of the subject occurs.

original: bya bas ni yang rnam pa gzhan du me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid yin zhing byed pa po dang las dag gcig pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba la me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas ci ltar bud shing gi ngo
analyzed: bya bas ni yang rnam pa gzhan du me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid yin zhing byed pa po dang las dag gcig pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba la me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du rjes su dpog pas ci ltar bud shing gi ngo
translated: This is another way of saying that if you assert that fire and fuel are the same and the agent and object are the same, since fire and fuel are inferred to be the same, how could fuel be the object of the action of burning?

original: bo nyid mi tsha ba dang mi sreg pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du me'i ngo bo nyid kyang mi tsha ba dang mi sreg pa nyid yin par 'gyur bas chos can me'i khyad par tsha ba nyid dang sreg pa nyid dag bsal ba'i skyon yod pas mi🔽rung ngo zhes bstan to //
analyzed: bo nyid mi tsha ba dang mi sreg pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du me'i ngo bo nyid kyang mi tsha ba dang mi sreg pa nyid yin par 'gyur bas chos can me'i khyad par tsha ba nyid dang sreg pa nyid dag bsal ba'i skyon yod pas mi rung ngo zhes bstan to //
translated: burning.

original: gal te mthong bas gnod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na zhes bya ba ni pha rol po dag na re rigs pa'i mtshan nyid las /
analyzed: gal te mthong bas gnod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na zhes bya ba ni pha rol po dag na re rigs pa'i mtshan nyid las /
translated: If you say that this is not a fallacy because it is contradicted by perception,🔽the opponent might say that according to the Nyāyamukha:

original: gnod pa med na 'gal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gnod pa med na 'gal bar 'gyur //
translated: If there is no contradiction, there is no fallacy.

original: zhes 'byung bas khyed kyis kho bo cag gi dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod par brjod pa 'di la yang gal te gnod @211a * //
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas khyed kyis kho bo cag gi dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon yod par brjod pa 'di la yang gal te gnod @211a * //
translated: Therefore, if there is no contradiction in your saying that our thesis is falla

original: pa med na ni skyon yod par yang 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: pa med na ni skyon yod par yang 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: because the subject is not specified, then it would be a fallacy.

original: 'jig rten na me la tsha ba nyid dang sreg pa nyid yod par mthong ba'i mngon sum gyi tshad mas khyed kyi sgrub pa la gnod pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon med do zhes zer ba yin
analyzed: 'jig rten na me la tsha ba nyid dang sreg pa nyid yod par mthong ba'i mngon sum gyi tshad mas khyed kyi sgrub pa la gnod pa'i phyir kho bo cag gi dam bcas pa la chos can gyi khyad par bsal ba'i skyon med do zhes zer ba yin
translated: We say, Because the valid cognition of direct perception that sees that fire has the qualities of heat and burning contradicts your proof, there is no fault of the subject's property being unestablished in our thesis.

original: no // de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: no // de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis /
translated: In response to that statement, the author of the commentary says:

original: gcig pa nyid la yang mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid la yang mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Seeing contradicts identity as well.

original: khyed me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du 'dod pa la yang 'jig rten na me dang bud shing dag tha dad par mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir de gnyis gcig pa nyid yin par mi 'thad de //
analyzed: khyed me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du 'dod pa la yang 'jig rten na me dang bud shing dag tha dad par mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir de gnyis gcig pa nyid yin par mi 'thad de //
translated: Even in your assertion that fire and fuel are identical, seeing that fire and fuel are different in the world contradicts that, so it is not tenable that those two are identical.

original: ci ste mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa yod pas me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du mi 'dod do zhes zer ba'i phyogs snga ma khong nas dbyung ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir grub
analyzed: ci ste mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa yod pas me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du mi 'dod do zhes zer ba'i phyogs snga ma khong nas dbyung ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir grub
translated: But if you say that you do not assert that fire and fuel are the same because of the fear of being harmed by seeing that they are the same, then the author of the commentary has completely abandoned that former position.

original: pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore he says that it contradicts your tenets.

original: khyed kyis me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ces bya ba de 'dir yongs su spangs pa'i phyir sngar de gnyis gcig pa nyid du dam bcas pa'i rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: khyed kyis me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ces bya ba de 'dir yongs su spangs pa'i phyir sngar de gnyis gcig pa nyid du dam bcas pa'i rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
translated: You completely abandon the assertion that fire and fuel are the same. Therefore it contradicts your own tenets that you previously asserted that they are the same.

original: ci ste pha rol po dag rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'i skyon de dag la sogs pa ni gcig pa nyid du khas blangs pa las gyur pas de kho bo cag gcig pa nyid du khas mi len to zhes zer ba'i phyogs snga ma khong nas
analyzed: ci ste pha rol po dag rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal ba'i skyon de dag la sogs pa ni gcig pa nyid du khas blangs pa las gyur pas de kho bo cag gcig pa nyid du khas mi len to zhes zer ba'i phyogs snga ma khong nas
translated: But if the opponent says that since the faults of contradicting your own tenets arise from asserting that they are the same, we do not assert that they are the same, then the author of the commentary says:

original: dbyung ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: dbyung ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis /
translated: In response to that, the author of this commentary says:

original: de ltar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa med do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de ltar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa med do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Since we do not accept that, there is no fault in our assertion.

original: me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir /
translated: Since we do not accept that fire and fuel are identical,🔽although you say they are different, there is no fault in our assertion.

original: gzhan pa nyid du smras kyang khas blangs pa la gnod pa ni med mod kyi des na me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du ma grub po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzhan pa nyid du smras kyang khas blangs pa la gnod pa ni med mod kyi des na me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du ma grub po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: But that does not establish that fire and fuel are identical.🔽This is the meaning.

original: de ltar re zhig me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus, it is untenable that fire and fuel are identical.

original: mjug bsdu ba dang tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: mjug bsdu ba dang tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: This is the conclusion and the result of the valid cognition.

original: brtag pa gnyis pa mi 'thad par bstan pa'i phyir ci ste gzhan nyid du 'dod na de'i phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: brtag pa gnyis pa mi 'thad par bstan pa'i phyir ci ste gzhan nyid du 'dod na de'i phyir bshad pa /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the second analysis is untenable, Nāgārjuna explains:

original: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
analyzed: gal te shing las me gzhan na //
translated: If fire were different from fuel,

original: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: it would arise even without fuel.

original: gzhan yin pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gzhan yin pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin no zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Because it is different from it, like something else.

original: dper na chu las gzhan pa'i me ni de las gzhan yin pa'i phyir chu med par yang me 'byung ba de bzhin du bud @211b shing las gzhan pa'i me yang de las gzhan yin pa'i phyir bud shing med par yang me 'byung ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhes
analyzed: dper na chu las gzhan pa'i me ni de las gzhan yin pa'i phyir chu med par yang me 'byung ba de bzhin du bud @211b shing las gzhan pa'i me yang de las gzhan yin pa'i phyir bud shing med par yang me 'byung ba'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhes
translated: For example, if fire were different from fuel, like fire different from water, then fire would arise even without fuel.

original: bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: bud shing med par me 'byung ba de mi 'thad par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bud shing med par me 'byung ba de mi 'thad par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that it is untenable that fire arises without fuel,

original: 'di lta ste bud shing la mi ltos par me yod do zhes bya ba de mngon par zhen pa'i blo can dag kyang mi 'dod do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: 'di lta ste bud shing la mi ltos par me yod do zhes bya ba de mngon par zhen pa'i blo can dag kyang mi 'dod do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: it is said: Those who have a mind that conceives of things in this way, that is, that fire exists without depending on fuel, do not assert that.🔽This also demonstrates:

original: 'dis kyang / gal te shing las me gzhan la //
analyzed: 'dis kyang / gal te shing las me gzhan la //
translated: If fire were different from fuel,

original: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shing med par yang 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: it would arise even without fuel.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed 'og ma shos 'di yang gal te me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin par gyur na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed 'og ma shos 'di yang gal te me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin par gyur na /
translated: This second half of the verse is also a statement that if fire and fuel were different,

original: bud shing med par me 'byung ba thal bar 'gyur ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin par smras pa'i sgrub pa las bzlog pas me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag pa
analyzed: bud shing med par me 'byung ba thal bar 'gyur ba'i glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir pha rol pos me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin par smras pa'i sgrub pa las bzlog pas me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag pa
translated: it would be possible to state that fire arises without fuel, and thus the opponent’s proof that fire and fuel are different would be reversed, and it would be inferred that fire and fuel are not different.

original: mngon no zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: mngon no zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: This is what is being shown.🔽This shows that fire and fuel have the property of being related.

original: 'dis ni me dang bud shing dag gi chos ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid bstan to zhes bya ba ni gzhung gong ma 'dis ni me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid ma yin par bsgrub pa'i chos gtan tshigs ni de dag phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa
analyzed: 'dis ni me dang bud shing dag gi chos ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid bstan to zhes bya ba ni gzhung gong ma 'dis ni me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid ma yin par bsgrub pa'i chos gtan tshigs ni de dag phan tshun ltos pa dang bcas pa
translated: This earlier text shows that the property of the proof that fire and fuel are not different is that they are mutually related.

original: nyid yin par bstan to //
analyzed: nyid yin par bstan to //
translated: This is the reason.

original: de'i phyir 'dir bstan par bya ba'i don gyi dbang gis rjes su dpag par 'dod pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag pa ston to //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir bstan par bya ba'i don gyi dbang gis rjes su dpag par 'dod pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid ma yin par rjes su dpag pa ston to //
translated: Therefore, in this context, the meaning of the word “infer” in the phrase “inferring that fire and fuel are not different” is to be understood in terms of the intended meaning of the teaching.

original: don dam par me na bud shing las gzhan ma yin te ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba dag ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang /
analyzed: don dam par me na bud shing las gzhan ma yin te ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba dag ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang /
translated: The subject is “ultimately, fire is not different from fuel,” the predicate is “because it is dependent,” the property of the subject is “fire,” and the example is “for example, like the intrinsic reality of fuel.”

original: dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: These are to be applied in order.

original: dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid ni rang gi bdag nyid la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bud shing las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du me yang bud shing la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bud shing las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid ni rang gi bdag nyid la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bud shing las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du me yang bud shing la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir bud shing las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: For example, the intrinsic reality of fuel is not different from fuel because it is dependent on fuel. In the same way, fire is not different from fuel because it is dependent on fuel.

original: des ni me phyogs su byas te bud shing las gzhan ma yin par bstan to //
analyzed: des ni me phyogs su byas te bud shing las gzhan ma yin par bstan to //
translated: This demonstrates that the fuel is not different from fire, taking the side of fire.

original: de bzhin du don dam par bud shing yang me las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par bud shing yang me las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, in an ultimate sense, fuel is not different from fire,

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bya ba dag kyang chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang / dpe yin par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: because it is related to fire, just like the nature of fire itself. The subject, the predicate of the proposition, the proof, and the example are to be applied in order.

original: dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid dag gi rang gi bdag nyid la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ma las @212a * //
analyzed: dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid dag gi rang gi bdag nyid la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ma las @212a * //
translated: For example, the nature of fire itself is not different from fuel, because it is related to fuel.

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du bud shing yang me la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir me las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du bud shing yang me la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir me las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, fuel is not different from fire, because it is related to fire.

original: des ni bud shing phyogs su byas te me las gzhan ma yin pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni bud shing phyogs su byas te me las gzhan ma yin pa bstan to //
translated: This demonstrates that the fuel is not different from fire, taking the side of fuel.

original: gal te me dang bud shing dag tha dad pa nyid kyis thams cad ltos pa dang bcas pa dag gis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na zhes bya ba ni pha rol po dag na re dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir zhes bya
analyzed: gal te me dang bud shing dag tha dad pa nyid kyis thams cad ltos pa dang bcas pa dag gis ma nges pa nyid do zhe na zhes bya ba ni pha rol po dag na re dbu ma pa'i gtan tshigs ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir zhes bya
translated: But if you say that fire and fuel are different because everything is dependent, then your reason is not established.

original: ba de ma nges pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba yin te /
analyzed: ba de ma nges pa nyid yin no zhes zer ba yin te /
translated: This is what the opponent says: “The reason ‘because it is dependent’ is not established.

original: 'jig rten na bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa thams cad ltos pa dang bcas pa yang yin la /
analyzed: 'jig rten na bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa thams cad ltos pa dang bcas pa yang yin la /
translated: Because in the world, all things such as pots and cloth are seen to be dependent and also different.

original: gzhan nyid kyang yin par mthong bas des na ci re zhig bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa dag bzhin du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin pa lta bur 'gyur ram /
analyzed: gzhan nyid kyang yin par mthong bas des na ci re zhig bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa dag bzhin du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin pa lta bur 'gyur ram /
translated: Therefore, what is the point of saying that because they are dependent, they are like pots and cloth, which are different?

original: 'on te me dang bud shing dag bzhin du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhan nyid ma yin pa bzhin du 'gyur ba ma nges pa nyid yin pas gtan tshigs su mi rung ngo zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'on te me dang bud shing dag bzhin du ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhan nyid ma yin pa bzhin du 'gyur ba ma nges pa nyid yin pas gtan tshigs su mi rung ngo zhes zer ro //
translated: Or, because they are dependent, they are not different, like fire and fuel? Since it is not definite, the reason is not established.”

original: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: de skad ces zer ba de'i lan du 'dir 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis /
translated: In response to that, the author of this commentary says:

original: de dag kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang rigs mthun pa nyid kyis mtshungs par bkag pa'i phyir skyon med do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de dag kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang rigs mthun pa nyid kyis mtshungs par bkag pa'i phyir skyon med do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Since those are also refuted equally by the reasonings that are similar to the probandum, there is no fault.

original: ci ltar don dam par me dang bud shing dag ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhan nyid ma yin par bsgrub pa de bzhin du bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa de dag kyang mtshungs par bkag pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pas gtan tshigs ma
analyzed: ci ltar don dam par me dang bud shing dag ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir gzhan nyid ma yin par bsgrub pa de bzhin du bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa de dag kyang mtshungs par bkag pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pas gtan tshigs ma
translated: Just as fire and fuel are not established as different in the ultimate because they are related, in the same way, a pot, a cloth, and so on are also refuted equally. Therefore, since there is no discordant side, the reason is not indeterminate.

original: ngas pa nyid kyi skyon med do /🔽// / bam po bzhi bcu drug pa /
analyzed: ngas pa nyid kyi skyon med do /🔽// / bam po bzhi bcu drug pa /
translated: There is no fault.

original: me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du khas len pa la skyon gzhan 'di yang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dag gzhan nyid du khas lan pa la rgyu med pa dang / rtsom pa don med pa dang / las med pa'i skyon gzhan rnam pa gsum yang yod do zhes ston to //
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du khas len pa la skyon gzhan 'di yang yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni dag gzhan nyid du khas lan pa la rgyu med pa dang / rtsom pa don med pa dang / las med pa'i skyon gzhan rnam pa gsum yang yod do zhes ston to //
translated: The other three faults are that there would be no cause, activity would be pointless, and there would be no karma.

original: de la re zhig rgyu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la re zhig rgyu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir 'di lta ste /
translated: To demonstrate the fault that there would be no cause, it says:

original: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid 'gyur //
translated: It would always be burning.

original: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung //
analyzed: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung //
translated: It would arise without a cause of burning.

original: gal te bud shing las me gzhan nyid yin par gyur na bud shing la mi ltos par rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te bud shing las me gzhan nyid yin par gyur na bud shing la mi ltos par rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur te /
translated: If fire were different from fuel, it would always burn without depending on fuel.

original: de la bud shing de med kyang 'chi bar mi 'thad cing rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la bud shing de med kyang 'chi bar mi 'thad cing rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since it would not be tenable that it would go out without fuel, it would be permanent.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it would arise without a cause of burning.

original: 'bar byed ces bya ba ni bud shing ngo //
analyzed: 'bar byed ces bya ba ni bud shing ngo //
translated: “Burning” is fuel.

original: gang la rgyud yod pa de ni 'bar byed kyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
analyzed: gang la rgyud yod pa de ni 'bar byed kyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
translated: That which has fuel is arisen from a cause that is a producer of fire.

original: @212b 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu med pa las byung pa'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: @212b 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni 'bar bar byed pa'i rgyu med pa las byung pa'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: That which is arisen from a cause that is not a producer of fire is arisen from a cause that is not a producer of fire.

original: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung bar 'gyur na rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung bar 'gyur na rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it were arisen from a cause that is not a producer of fire, it follows it would always be burning.

original: 'di ltar 'bar byed la ltos na ni 'bar byed med ni de 'chi bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'bar byed la ltos na ni 'bar byed med ni de 'chi bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: In that case, if it were dependent on a producer of fire, it would be extinguished when there is no producer of fire.

original: me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin par gyur na me de bud shing la ltos pa med pa'i phyir de la 'bar byed med par rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur te //
analyzed: me dang bud shing dag gzhan yin par gyur na me de bud shing la ltos pa med pa'i phyir de la 'bar byed med par rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur te //
translated: But if fire and fuel were different, then because fire would not depend on fuel, it follows it would always be burning without a producer of fire.

original: des ni me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin par gyur na me la rgyu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba bstan te //
analyzed: des ni me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin par gyur na me la rgyu med pa'i skyon du 'gyur ba bstan te //
translated: This shows that if fire and fuel were different, the error would ensue that fire would be without a cause.

original: rtsom pa don med pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir gzhan yang 'chi ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir bud shing skam po gzhug pa dang sbar ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsom pa dag kyang mi 'thad pas /
analyzed: rtsom pa don med pa nyid kyi skyon du 'gyur ba bstan pa'i phyir gzhan yang 'chi ba yongs su spang ba'i phyir bud shing skam po gzhug pa dang sbar ba'i mtshan nyid kyi rtsom pa dag kyang mi 'thad pas /
translated: In order to demonstrate the error of the futility of undertaking, he says, moreover, it is not tenable that the undertaking of kindling, which has the characteristic of adding dry fuel in order to completely extinguish a fire, exists.

original: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
translated: The undertaking would be futile.

original: don med pa ni don dang bral pa'o //
analyzed: don med pa ni don dang bral pa'o //
translated: Futility is the absence of purpose.

original: de'i dngos po ni don med pa nyid de 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go zhig go zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni don med pa nyid de 'bras bu nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go zhig go zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Its state is futility, which is to say, the absence of result.

original: me rtag tu 'bar ba nyid yin par gyur na dbyung ba dang sbar ba la sogs pa rtsom pa dag don med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me rtag tu 'bar ba nyid yin par gyur na dbyung ba dang sbar ba la sogs pa rtsom pa dag don med pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If fire were to always burn, the undertaking of kindling and burning would be futile.

original: ma dang bud shing dag gzhan yin par gyur na me la las med pa'i skyon du 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma dang bud shing dag gzhan yin par gyur na me la las med pa'i skyon du 'gyur bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the error that if fuel and fire were different, fire would not have fuel as its object, he says,

original: de lta yin na las kyang med //
analyzed: de lta yin na las kyang med //
translated: if it were so, there would be no object.

original: las med pa ni las yong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: las med pa ni las yong ba ma yin te /
translated: An objectless object is not an object.

original: bud shing la mi ltos pa de 'byung zhing gnas pas bsreg par bya ba sreg pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las med pa'i phyir de ni mi 'dod do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: bud shing la mi ltos pa de 'byung zhing gnas pas bsreg par bya ba sreg pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las med pa'i phyir de ni mi 'dod do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: But since it would arise and endure without depending on fuel, it would not have the activity of burning, which is characterized by the act of burning fuel.🔽Thus, it is unacceptable.

original: rtsom pa dag don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba de lta na me la las med par yang thal bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: rtsom pa dag don med pa nyid du 'gyur ba de lta na me la las med par yang thal bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: If that were so, it would follow that fire would be without activity,

original: rnam pa de lta bu ni mer mi 'thad pas me nyid med pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu ni mer mi 'thad pas me nyid med pa nyid du yang thal bar 'gyur bas de ni mi 'dod do //
translated: and since it is unacceptable that fire be without activity, it would follow that fire itself would be nonexistent.

original: grong mi'i bud med yan chad la yang me ni rgyu dang ldan pa nyid dang / rtsom pa dang bcas pa nyid dang las dang bcas pa nyid du grags par 'dod pas de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa smra bar nus te zhes bya ba ni ci skad bstan pa'i skyon rnam pa gsum po de dag yongs su spang bar 'dod pas me dang bud
analyzed: grong mi'i bud med yan chad la yang me ni rgyu dang ldan pa nyid dang / rtsom pa dang bcas pa nyid dang las dang bcas pa nyid du grags par 'dod pas de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa smra bar nus te zhes bya ba ni ci skad bstan pa'i skyon rnam pa gsum po de dag yongs su spang bar 'dod pas me dang bud
translated: Since it is accepted that fire is renowned as possessing a cause, as having a beginning, and as having activity, even for the people of the village, therefore it is possible to state a logical argument.

original: shing dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa smra bar nus so zhes ston to //
analyzed: shing dag gzhan ma yin pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa smra bar nus so zhes ston to //
translated: It is possible to state an inference that fire is not different from fuel.

original: don dam par me ni bud shing las gzhan ma yin te /🔽rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang las dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid pa ni na te zhes bya ba dang ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang /
analyzed: don dam par me ni bud shing las gzhan ma yin te / rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang las dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid pa ni na te zhes bya ba dang ni chos can dang / bsgrub par bya ba chos dang / sgrub pa'i chos dang /
translated: Ultimately, fire is not different from fuel,🔽because it has a cause, because it is an undertaking, and because it has an action, just like the nature of fuel itself.

original: dpe yin @213a * //🔽par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
analyzed: dpe yin @213a * // par go rims bzhin du sbyar te /
translated: The subject, the probandum, the probative property, and the example are stated in order.

original: dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid ni rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / las dang bcas pa'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du me yang rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: dper na bud shing gi rang gi bdag nyid ni rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang / rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / las dang bcas pa'i phyir rang gi bdag nyid las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du me yang rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
translated: For example, the nature of fuel itself is not different from itself, because it has a cause, because it is an undertaking, and because it has an action.

original: rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / las dang bcas pa'i phyir bud shing las gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / las dang bcas pa'i phyir bud shing las gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Because it is associated with composition and because it is associated with action, it is not different from fuel.

original: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The rest is as before.

original: ci ltar sngar me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par brtag pa'i skabs su pha rol po dag na re mthong bas gnod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhes zer ba'i lan du gcig pa nyid la yang mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ltar sngar me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid ma yin par brtag pa'i skabs su pha rol po dag na re mthong bas gnod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhes zer ba'i lan du gcig pa nyid la yang mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: As was previously explained in the context of the analysis of fire and fuel, the opponent might say, “There is no error because it is not perceived,” but we reply, “It is perceived in the case of identity.”

original: de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: de yongs su spangs pa'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
translated: Because it is completely abandoned, it contradicts your tenets.

original: de ltar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa med de /
analyzed: de ltar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa med de /
translated: Because you do not accept this, you are not undermined by what you yourself accept.🔽Thus it is untenable that fire and fuel are identical.

original: de ltar re zhig me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig me dang bud shing dag gcig pa nyid du mi 'thad do zhes bstan pa de bzhin du 'dir yang /
translated: Here, in the same way, it is untenable that

original: gal te pha rol po dag na re kun sbyin pa la sogs pa'i me dag la rgyu med par yang me nyid yod par mthong ba'i phyir me de bud shing las gzhan yin par mthong bas gnod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te pha rol po dag na re kun sbyin pa la sogs pa'i me dag la rgyu med par yang me nyid yod par mthong ba'i phyir me de bud shing las gzhan yin par mthong bas gnod pa'i phyir skyon med do zhe na /
translated: But if the opponent says, “Since we see that fire exists without fuel, such as when the fire is extinguished, we see that fire is different from fuel. Therefore, your argument is invalid,”

original: de'i lan du gzhan nyid la yang mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i lan du gzhan nyid la yang mthong bas gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then in response to that, we say, “Your view is undermined by the fact that we see that they are different.”

original: de yongs su spang ba'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: de yongs su spang ba'i phyir grub pa'i mtha' dang 'gal lo //
translated: In order to completely abandon that view, it contradicts your philosophical position.

original: de ltar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa med de /
analyzed: de ltar khas ma blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa la gnod pa med de /
translated: Since we do not accept that, your argument does not undermine our position.

original: de ltar re zhig me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du mi 'thad do zhes rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid du mi 'thad do zhes rgyas par snga ma bzhin du sbyar ba yin te /
translated: Thus, as before, it is extensively applied, “In that case, it is untenable that fire and fuel are different.”

original: des ni me phyogs su byas te gzhan nyid dgag pa bstan to //
analyzed: des ni me phyogs su byas te gzhan nyid dgag pa bstan to //
translated: This teaches the refutation of difference, taking fire as the example.

original: de bzhin du bud shing gi phyogs la yang brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du don dam par bud shing yang me las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bud shing gi phyogs la yang brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du don dam par bud shing yang me las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: “The same should be said in the case of fuel” means that in the same way, ultimately fuel is not different from fire.

original: rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / las dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bud shing phyogs su byas te /
analyzed: rgyu dang ldan pa'i phyir dang rtsom pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dang / las dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no zhes bud shing phyogs su byas te /
translated: Because it has a cause, because it is an undertaking, and because it has an action, like the intrinsic reality of fire.

original: rjes su dpag pa dang brgal ba dang lan dag gis bud shing las me gzhan nyid ma yin par dgag pa brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa dang brgal ba dang lan dag gis bud shing las me gzhan nyid ma yin par dgag pa brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: The refutation that fire is not different from fuel should be expressed through inference, objections, and replies.

original: bud shing gi phyogs la las dang bcas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang dpe ci ltar 'grub ce na /
analyzed: bud shing gi phyogs la las dang bcas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dang dpe ci ltar 'grub ce na /
translated: How is the reason and example established in the case of fuel, because it has an action?

original: de'i phyir bud shing la yang gzugs par bya ba la sogs pa'i las yod pa'i phyir las dang bcas pa nyid du grub pas bud shing gi gtan tshigs dang dpe @213b nyid ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bud shing la yang gzugs par bya ba la sogs pa'i las yod pa'i phyir las dang bcas pa nyid du grub pas bud shing gi gtan tshigs dang dpe @213b nyid ma grub pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore, since fuel is established as having an action because it has actions such as being burned, the reason and example of fuel are not unestablished.

original: bud shing gis gzhan la gzugs par bya ba la sogs pa ni bud shing gi las yin pas de na bud shing gi gtan tshigs las dang bcas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dag dang / dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin te zhes bya ba'i dpe nyid kyang grub ste /🔽des ni bud shing phyogs su byas te /
analyzed: bud shing gis gzhan la gzugs par bya ba la sogs pa ni bud shing gi las yin pas de na bud shing gi gtan tshigs las dang bcas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba dag dang / dper na me'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin te zhes bya ba'i dpe nyid kyang grub ste / des ni bud shing phyogs su byas te /
translated: Just like the self-existence of fire.

original: bud shing las me gzhan nyid ma yin par dgag pa bstan to //
analyzed: bud shing las me gzhan nyid ma yin par dgag pa bstan to //
translated: This demonstrates the refutation that fire is not different from fuel.🔽If you think, why is it that it follows that fire would arise without a cause and effort would be pointless?

original: de la 'di snyam du ci'i phyir 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang rtsom pa don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur snyam du sems na de la bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de la 'di snyam du ci'i phyir 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang rtsom pa don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur snyam du sems na de la bshad par bya ste /
translated: Then in response to that, it should be explained:

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it would not depend on another,

original: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung //
analyzed: 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung //
translated: it would arise without a cause.

original: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid yin na //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid yin na //
translated: If it were always burning,

original: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
translated: effort would be pointless.

original: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung bar 'gyur la rtag tu 'bar ba nyid yin na rtsom pa don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni snga ma'i 'thad pa gzhan bstan to //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung bar 'gyur la rtag tu 'bar ba nyid yin na rtsom pa don med pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas ni snga ma'i 'thad pa gzhan bstan to //
translated: Since it would not depend on another, it would arise without a cause, and if it were to always burn, then it would follow that the effort to ignite it would be pointless.

original: ci ste pha rol po dag slob dpon gyis me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin pa'i skyon brjod pa /
analyzed: ci ste pha rol po dag slob dpon gyis me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin pa'i skyon brjod pa /
translated: But if the opponent, in order to avoid the error that the master has stated, that fire and fuel would be different,

original: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur //
translated: it would always be burning,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang dag gsungs pa ji skad bstan par thal bar 'gyur ba dag yongs su spang bar 'dod pas de la gal te 'di snyam du /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gang dag gsungs pa ji skad bstan par thal bar 'gyur ba dag yongs su spang bar 'dod pas de la gal te 'di snyam du /
translated: and so on, and in order to completely avoid the consequences stated, thinks as follows:

original: sreg bzhin bud shing yin sems na //
analyzed: sreg bzhin bud shing yin sems na //
translated: If you think that what is burning is fuel,

original: mes khyab cing sreg bzhin pa nyid na bud shing zhes bya zhing me la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i bud shing ni bud shing nyid du grub pa'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon med do snyam du sems na zhes bya ba ni ci ste pha rol po dag
analyzed: mes khyab cing sreg bzhin pa nyid na bud shing zhes bya zhing me la ltos pa dang bcas pa'i bud shing ni bud shing nyid du grub pa'i phyir thal bar 'gyur ba'i skyon med do snyam du sems na zhes bya ba ni ci ste pha rol po dag
translated: But if you think that when it is pervaded by fire and is being burned, it is called fuel, and that since fuel that is dependent on fire is established as fuel, there is no error of the consequence, then what is the response to the following?

original: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin pa'i skyon brjod pa /
analyzed: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyis me dang bud shing dag gzhan nyid yin pa'i skyon brjod pa /
translated: The master Nāgārjuna stated the error that fire and fuel are different:

original: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur /🔽'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung //
analyzed: rtag tu 'bar ba nyid du 'gyur / 'bar byed med pa'i rgyu las byung //
translated: It would always be burning.🔽It would arise without a cause of burning.

original: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsom pa don med nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Initiation would be pointless.

original: de lta yin na las kyang med //
analyzed: de lta yin na las kyang med //
translated: If that were so, there would be no karma.🔽The author of the commentary explains that the consequence that is stated in this way is completely rejected by those who wish to abandon their own position.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa gang dag gsungs pa 'grel pa byed pas ci skad bstan pa de lta bu rang gi phyogs la thal bar 'gyur ba dag yongs su spang bar 'dod pas de dag gal te 'di snyam du gang gi phyir mes khyab cing sreg bzhin
